item.title: Generating Royal History
item.description: Recently I found myself in a bit of a bind as someone who wants to write homebrew content for a very popular tabletop role-playing game. As is so common in many fantasy settings, there is some sort of feudal system, and there is some history of rulers, possibly with noble houses vying for power. I had arbitrarily selected – with the help of the donjon Fantasy Calendar Generator – that the year in the setting was in the very late 600s.
